scripts.bootstrap: git submodule update --init && jlpm --no-optional && jlpm clean && jlpm lint && jlpm lerna bootstrap && jlpm build && jlpm lab:link
scripts.build: jlpm build:core && jlpm build:js && jlpm build:kyrnel && jlpm build:lyb
scripts.build:demo: mkdir -p index_files _demo && rm -rf index_files/* && jupyter nbconvert --to=jyve index.ipynb --JyveExporter.extra_contents='["notebooks/*.ipynb"]' && cp -r index_files/* _demo/
scripts.lab:stats: cd $CONDA_PREFIX/share/jupyter/lab/staging && mkdir -p build && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js --profile --json > stats.json && mv stats.json build/
scripts.lint: jlpm lint:sh && jlpm lint:py && jlpm lint:prettier && jlpm lint:ts && jlpm lint:robot
scripts.lint:py: black jyve setup.py && flake8 jyve setup.py
scripts.lint:robot: python -m robot.tidy -r tests && rflint --configure TooManyTestSteps:30 --configure TooFewKeywordSteps:0 --configure LineTooLong:200 tests/**/*.robot
